page.title: 03THE ENTERPRISE ZONE (cont)
page.content: The cleared land has been formed into level sites and supplied with roads, drains, electricity and water ready for development.Wide landscaping belts surround the sites to give a pleasant environment.Not only manufacturing industry is welcome to the park. Benefits are also attractive to retail stores, offices, hotels and other "service" industries. Further reclamation work on the remaining slag heaps is planned and land which is not suitable for industry will be upgraded and provided with modern services.
